title: Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate, 6-2-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 02, 2009

 



Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate, 6-2-09




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                             June 2, 2009   NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:   Daniel Ginsberg, of the District of Columbia, to be an Assistant Secretary of the Air Force, vice Craig W. Duehring.   Louis B. Susman, of Illinois, to be Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the United States of America to the United Kingdom  of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
